fter the first C2C show though. Anyway, doesn't matter.

VP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: Ticket_to_Heaven@...: Sat, 1 Dec 2007=

I doubt that "they" gave Chris Moon a "Frank's Box" to use/abuse it (withou=
t Authorization or Rights) to start up, a For-Profit making, business(es), =
which IS what Chris Moon has done! It was ment for testing purposes or rese=
arch only! =3DJudy=3D . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .=

based reasoning's and omni-potent subterfuge employed by> Mr. Moon> > > onl=
y tells me to ignore him and anyone else like him. There is no> manual or> =

fore> > > open to many different interpretations and methodologies. Take> t=

 experiment with as a> device for> > > ITC, Instrumental Trans-Communicatio=

io devioce,a nd photography device)> was never> > > described by me, it's i=
nverntor, as the "Telephone to the Dead",> that label> > > was put on my eq=
uipment, loaned to Moon for testing, he was the> first to> > > want to test=
 the box, he is not, and was not designated by me as the> > > "primary test=
er". In fact he has yet to pay anything for the> boxes he has,> > > or any =
of the other equipment he "barrowed", such as the Sony> pocket size> > > ca=
ssette recorder, and Tarot CD, he still has. Moon is the one> that claims> =

the> > > box, despite the fact that I have stated numerous times that I> ma=
de the box> > > for anyone to use, and one's results are any no better or s=
upercede in> > > anyway the results of anyone else. > > > > > > Now when so=
meone claims that these new system don't work, or only> get the> > > evil s=
pirits, and even open portals so demons, or what not can> enter, they> > > =
are lying, and attempting to keep the use of any equipment, and> methods of=

r as I> > > can tell. The portal thing is Hollywood! I use my equimpemt in =
my> basement,.> > > and have sinece 2000, amnd have never expereinced anyth=
ing I could> call evil> > > beside soem cussing, nakme calling voices, whic=
h is hardly threatening> > > except to maybe 13 year old girl. > > > > > > =
I must point put, because of preivisou threats, that slander is> stating> >=
 > something in public about a person that is knowingly untrue. So> for any=
one> > > comptemplating such threats I can say only-- Bring It, I will have=
> > > everything you own!> > > > > > > > > > > > _____ > > > > > > You keep=
 typing, we keep giving. Download Messenger and join the i'm> > > Initiativ=
e now. Join> > > <http://im.live.com/messenger/im/home/?source=3DCRM_WL_joi=
nnow> in!> > >> > - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -=
 - - - > Hi Frank, Perhaps you can talk to an attorney to sue Chris for usi=
ng> his 'Borrowed" & on "Loan" Frank's Box (& Tarot CD) of YOURS (you own> =
it still) and refuses to return it to you (once you send him a letter> to r=
eturn YOUR property back & to stop spreading lies about it to the> Public)?=
??? Put him "out of business" in making money/profits from> YOUR box! This =
seem unethical in what he's now doing, don't ya think?> My 2c worth. Makes =
me annoyed! =3DJudy=3D .> . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .> >> I feel, he has =
"stolen" your sony recorder, Tarot CD, & boxes for his own benifits! Ugh! =
=3DJudy=3D P.S. I'd sue his butt to stop using the Box as HIS businesses! I=
t's not fair to you or others.
